feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A personal website for Shansita Das Sharma

entry.title: Ml Papers In 10 Minutes
entry.content: I used to make YouTube tutorials for iOS app development back in high school. Recently, I was explaining the workings of an LLM to my non-tech friend to demonstrate why the who-to-trust-less race between Wikipedia and LLMs may be a close one, and I realized that it’s really fun to break down ML topics. I went ahead and looked back at my old youtube channel and decided to start a series of explaining the key ideas behind research papers I find interesting during my literature reviews, all in videos under 10 minutes long. I figured, if anything, it’ll be practice for me to articulate ideas!
entry.summary: march & april, looking forward to summer
